description: {"blocks":[{"key":"e8usi","text":"This protocol describes how to express and purify human p62 tagged N-terminally with HIS and TEV. The expression is performed with E. coli Rosetta pLysS cells. The protein is purified via a HisTrap column and gel filtration (SEC). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":131,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.grant_id: Mechanisms of mitochondrial damage control by PINK1 and Parkin (ASAP-000350)

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4nd7u","text":"Grow E. coli Rosetta pLysS cells in   Luria broth medium at   until an OD600 nm of 0.8 is reached.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":5,"length":8},{"style":"sub","offset":73,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":60,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bqosp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"8","error":false,"guid":"0049E650095411EEB1FB0D93D16E4D5F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0202E0F0095411EEB1FB0D93D16E4D5F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5jsjq","text":"Centrifuge cells at 3000 rcf,  ,  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":33,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8m3ot","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4CFBBAE0095511EEB1FB0D93D16E4D5F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"4F4E3660095511EEB1FB0D93D16E4D5F","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e4m82","text":"Aspirate media and resuspend pellet in   Lysis Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8n64u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"64475290095511EEB1FB0D93D16E4D5F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"csilm","text":"Flash freeze sample in liquid nitrogen","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f17qh","text":"Thaw sample at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6hq54","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"8B2AC450095511EEB1FB0D93D16E4D5F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fvrre","text":"Sonicate sample 5 cycles at 65% power for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d4fgi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"A8716D20095511EEB1FB0D93D16E4D5F","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"55dd6","text":"Centrifuge sample 140,000 rcf at   for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":33,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7olpr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D41748F0095511EEB1FB0D93D16E4D5F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"D6BDFEF0095511EEB1FB0D93D16E4D5F","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fut2p","text":"Repeat sonication for a total of three times","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ca94g","text":"Equilibrate a HisTrap HP column (GE Healthcare) with 5 column volumes of water and 5 of HisTrap Buffer A","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fjcri","text":"During centrifugation perform equilibration","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a0hij","text":"Elute protein via a stepwise imidazole gradient using HisTrap Buffers A and B and elution steps: 25 mM, 62.5 mM, 118.75 mM, 148.75 mM, 212.mM, 306.25 mM and 400 mM imidazole","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bhmf5","text":"Add     to   TEV protease to pooled protein-containing fractions and incubate   at   to cleave.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":11,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":78,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":83,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ca4tg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"857A5B50095611EEB1FB0D93D16E4D5F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"150","error":false,"guid":"92187D60095611EEB1FB0D93D16E4D5F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"AB720D80095611EEB1FB0D93D16E4D5F","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B0955C40095611EEB1FB0D93D16E4D5F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ck4ao","text":"Concentrate resulting protein with a 30 kDa MWCO concentrator (Millipore) to between   and   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":85,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":91,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dqro8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":".5","error":false,"guid":"DA3221A0095611EEB1FB0D93D16E4D5F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"E255B810095611EEB1FB0D93D16E4D5F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
